QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, fin_burden_classes.id odf_pk, fin_burden_classes.IS_SYSTEM as is_system, fin_burden_classes.ACTIVE as is_active, odf_ca_burdeningclass.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_burdeningclass.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, fin_burden_classes.DESCRIPTION as description, created.full_name as created_by, odf_ca_burdeningclass.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, fin_burden_classes.NAME as name, updated.full_name as updated_by, FIN_BURDEN_CLASSES.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_burdeningclass.partition_code as partition_code, fin_burden_classes.BURDENING_TYPE as burdening_type, FIN_BURDEN_CLASSES.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_burdeningclass.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from fin_burden_classes fin_burden_classes JOIN odf_ca_burdeningclass odf_ca_burdeningclass ON odf_ca_burdeningclass.id=fin_burden_classes.id , SRM_RESOURCES created, SRM_RESOURCES updated where FIN_BURDEN_CLASSES.CREATED_BY = created.USER_ID AND FIN_BURDEN_CLASSES.LAST_UPDATED_BY = updated.USER_ID
